biography: Olli, a stalwart of Hirsala Golf, brings a unique blend of power and precision to the greens. A devoted admirer of Bryson DeChambeau, Olli's game reflects a similar commitment to scientific optimization and aggressive play.

With eight past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Olli is a seasoned competitor, and his experience is evident in his strategic course management and clutch performances. He has one victory at the Hector Trophée to his name, as well as one Victor Trophy, showcasing his ability to excel both in pairs and as an individual.

As he gears up for his ninth Hector Trophée in 2025, Olli undoubtedly has his sights set on adding to his impressive resume. His fans eagerly anticipate witnessing his unwavering determination and strategic brilliance on the course once again.
